tool_description: An API showing List of All Countries with their Official Name, Two Letter Code, Numeric code and Internet Code & List of all Languages with their Two Letter Code.
name: List of All Countries and Languages with their Codes
title: List of All Countries and Languages with their Codes
tool_name: List of All Countries and Languages with their Codes

api_list.name: List of All Countries
api_list.description:
This endpoint will list all Countries with their Country Name, Official State Name, Alpha 2 Code,  Alpha 3 Code,
Numeric Code, Internet Cctld Code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://list-of-all-countries-and-languages-with-their-codes.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "list-of-all-countries-and-languages-with-their-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
